text:
輪椅座位/ $1,699
升級體驗詳情
ULTIMATE SPHERES EXPERIENCE – HKD $6,599
▹ HKD $2,099 較佳坐位門票一張
▹ 獨家後台參觀體驗*
▹ 演出前在Coldplay即將表演的舞台上拍照（由專業攝影師拍攝）*
▹ 特設坐位接送專員
▹ Ultimate Spheres 體驗獨家周邊禮品
▹ Coldplay特別設計環保禮品
▹ Coldplay環保手帶一條
trans:
Wheelchair Seat/$1,699
Details of upgraded experience
ULTIMATE SPHERES EXPERIENCE – HKD $6,599
▹ HKD $2,099 for a better seat ticket
▹ Exclusive backstage experience*
▹ Photoshoot before the show on the stage where Coldplay will perform (taken by a professional photographer)*
▹ Special personnel taking you to and from the seat
▹ Ultimate Spheres experience exclusive merch gifts
▹ Coldplay specially designed eco-friendly gifts
▹ Coldplay eco-friendly bracelet
